Copy of Minute by General Smut a.W.P.C.100War Priorities Committee, 11, Pall Mall, S.W. 1. 13th December, 1918.The Secretary, War Cabinet, I shall be glad if the War Cabinet will now give theirformal approval to the dissolution of the War priorities committee, its existence boing no longer necessary. Suitable"arrangements will be made for disposal of its records and for transfer to post-war organisations of any of its functions which it is desirable should continue to be exercised for thepresent(Sgd.) J.C. SMUTS.
